name: Ethereumlab
body:
# Ethereum - Serpent Tutorial and Smart Contract Lab
This repository contains tutorials intended for instructors who wish to conduct a smart
contract programming lab, or students/developers who want to learn about smart contract
programming.

The [serpent tutorial](http://mc2-umd.github.io/ethereumlab/docs/serpent_tutorial.pdf) and [smart contract lab](http://mc2-umd.github.io/ethereumlab/docs/how_to_program_a_safe_smart_contract.pdf) .tex files are located in [Guides/](https://github.com/mc2-umd/ethereumlab/tree/master/Guides) and the full serpent contract examples are in [Examples/](https://github.com/mc2-umd/ethereumlab/tree/master/Examples).

The lab uses [pyethereum](https://github.com/ethereum/pyethereum). Detailed download instructions can be found on pyethereum's 
github or you can follow instructions in [serpent tutorial](http://mc2-umd.github.io/ethereumlab/docs/serpent_tutorial.pdf) to install our preconfigured VM-image.

Authors: Kevin Delmolino, Mitchell Arnett, Ahmed Kosba, Andrew Miller, Elaine Shi
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
